name: Introduction to Literary Analysis
title: WCAS SPANISH 220-0-2 Introduction to Literary Analysis

descriptions.name: Overview of Class
descriptions.value: Contact the department for further information

subject: SPANISH

overview_of_class: This course has multiple objectives in providing an introduction to narrative study: 1) exposure to a diversity of literary genres and cultural media; 2) familiarization with the chronological and geographical range associated with Hispanism (the study of Hispanic cultural production); 3) the refinement of critical skills in reading, writing, listening, and speaking; and 4) the development of a pedagogical awareness on the part of students through participation in the determination of course structure and content. Course requirements will include active course participation, frequent informal but critical writing, presentations, and a formal written essay.

Course requirements will include active course participation, frequent informal but critical writing, presentations, and a formal written essay.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 204 or AP 5 in Spanish Language AND Literature.
